trans-unit.source: Bootils offers process boot-strapping utilities that support writing robust application/service launcher and process life-cycle management scripts.
trans-unit.target: Bootils提供了支持编写健壮的应用程序/服务启动器和流程生命周期管理脚本的流程引导工具。

trans-unit.source: that watches your child process after starting, until it grows up into a stable running state.
trans-unit.target: ,在启动后观察孩子的进程,直到它成长为稳定的运行状态。
